intent.description: State the objective of the work to be continued. Do not include motivation, history, or conversational context.

established.description: Items that are fixed, agreed upon, and must be preserved without reinterpretation.

open_questions.description: Questions or areas that require continuation. No speculation or narrative.

blocked_items.description: Hard blockers or intentional pauses that prevent progress.

resume_from.description: Resume from the last stable semantic state. Never from a conversational turn.

next_expected_action.description: Define exactly one next action that advances the work.

notes.description: Optional remarks that must not modify intent, state, constraints, or execution.
